## Others
*.db
*.tmp
*.bak

# Ignore NuGet packages
*.nupkg
packages/
*.nuspec

# Ignore Clangd index
.clangd/

# Ignore node_modules (in case of frontend)
node_modules/

# Ignore compiled Python or Lua (if mixed scripting)
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.luac
